Title: Imagine Cup 2026: Where students build what’s next
Author: stclarke
Description: The post [Imagine Cup 2026: Where students build what’s next](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/studentdeveloperblog/imagine-cup-2026-where-students-build-what%E2%80%99s-next/4456700) appeared first on [Source](https://news.microsoft.com/source).
EnhancedContent:
## Great startups rarely begin with a spotlight. They begin when a small team dares to test something new, or when a student sees a challenge and chooses to answer it.

For more than two decades, Imagine Cup has highlighted the journeys of student founders, [stories](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/studentdeveloperblog/from-student-to-startup-why-microsoft-isn%E2%80%99t-just-a-platform%E2%80%94it%E2%80%99s-a-partner-in-po/4432175) of projects that grew into startups, or breakthroughs that gained recognition, and of teams that went on to shape what’s next. Now it’s your turn: [registration for Imagine Cup 2026 is open](https://imaginecup.microsoft.com/en-us/category/33).

## Two paths to compete

This year, Imagine Cup is designed to meet student founders wherever they are in their journey.

- **Scale** is for ventures already gaining traction, with users, or revenue. The World Champion will earn $100,000 USD\*, mentorship with Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella, and opportunities for deeper partnership with Microsoft for Startups.
- **Launch** is for teams building their foundation, testing prototypes, refining their Minimum Viable Product (MVP), or preparing for market. The winning team will receive $50,000 USD\* and continued visibility within the Microsoft ecosystem.

No matter your starting point, Imagine Cup gives you the tools, mentorship, and credibility to move further, faster.

## Categories that inspire

In 2026, students may choose to tackle opportunities in:

**Cybersecurity:** systems that outsmart threats and strengthen digital trust.

**Education:** technology that improves teaching and learning.

**Financial Services:** AI that builds trust and expands access.

**Health and Life Sciences:** tools that connect care and accelerate research.

**Retail and Consumer Goods:** solutions that make commerce smarter and more personal.

Or, carve your own path. The challenge is yours to define.

## Why join

Imagine Cup is more than a prize, it’s a chance to be part of a community where students turn bold beginnings into lasting startups. Along the way, you’ll unlock Azure credits, engage with expert-led training, and connect with mentors who understand what it takes to build for institutions and industries.

**Start your Imagine Cup journey today** - [register now](https://imaginecup.microsoft.com/en-us/category/33)!

\*Open only to enrolled high-school or college/university students 18+. For additional eligibility criteria, round start/end dates, and detailed instructions on how to participate, see the [Imagine Cup Official Rules and Regulations](https://aka.ms/icrulesregs).

Updated Sep 30, 2025
